room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Escape Room Missouri City in Houston
room_description: You believe the US military has been covering up a slew of UFO crashes and hiding the remains of the spacecrafts and extraterrestrial life forms in the top-secret military base known as Area 51. So you join a group of conspiracy theorists that befriended a security guard who gets you access to the facilityâ€™s medical lab. But the guard you befriended can only delay the alarm for 60 minutes before it triggers automatically indicating the facility has been infiltrated. Will your team find the secrets to Area 51 before the base security guards find you?
